articles.title: Microsoft introduces Azure Purview data catalog; announces GA of Synapse Analytics - ZDNet
articles.description: The long-awaited follow-up to Azure Data Catalog is here, featuring integration with both Power BI and Azure Synapse Analytics. And with the GA of Synapse's data lake features also being announced, data governance on the Azure cloud comes just in time.
